```{r setup}
#| include: false
library("tidyverse")
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- read_csv(here::here("data/lipidomics.csv"))
```

## Basic statistics

```{r}
descriptive_stats(lipidomics, metabolite, value)
```

## Figure outputs

```{r}
ggplot(lipidomics, aes(x = value)) +
    geom_histogram() +
    facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free")
```

```{r}
metabolite_distribution_plot (lipidomics, metabolite)
```
